attributes.action: bring in legislation that orders all bicycle manufactorers must fit lights as standard to all bikes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As fewer schools teach road safety to young cyclists, more and more of them use the public highway with very little road sense, especially at night.  If all bikes had lights fitted as standard, and it was law to use those lights, at least they may be seen and lives may be saved.
